column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Shiro Shinobi says : " Eight teams have been eliminated and eight advance into the quarter finals , which get underway way tonight .
#Text=" Mako says : " You were supposed to defend while I attacked !
#Text=" Korra says : " I had an opening so I took it !
#Text=" Bolin says : " What is up with you two ?
#Text=All right , whatever , just pull together , guys .
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " The Ferrets looking to mount some offense here in round two .
#Text=Bolin lets fly a flurry of attacks , he 's a one - man bending battalion .
#Text=The Ferrets are having a rough time finding their rhythm tonight , but thanks to Bolin , they narrowly notch round two .
#Text=Not sure what 's eating them , but this is not the same team who took out the Rabaroos .
#Text=" Ring announcer says : " Round three is a tie !
#Text=We go to a tie - breaker to decide the match .
#Text=" Referee says : " The Fire Ferrets win the coin toss !
#Text=Which element do you choose ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I got this .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I know you usually handle these , but frankly , your head 's not in the game .
#Text=I 'm gon na take this one .
#Text=We choose earth .
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " Looks like the earthbenders will collide in the tie - breaker face - off .
#Text=Bolin goes in for the grapple , Chang reverses .
#Text=Bolin strikes from midair , knocking Chang to the edge of the circle .
#Text=Another strike from Bolin , and Chang is in the drink !
#Text=" Ring announcer says : " The Future Industries Fire Ferrets win their quarterfinal match !
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " Oh , that was a close one folks !
#Text=Youth trumps experience tonight .
#Text="
